When her children are a bit older, she would like to open an underwear shop.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Emel Hanım biri dokuz diğeri üç yaşında iki çocuk annesi.  Maddi sıkıntılardan dolayı evine katkı sağlamak ,çocuklarının ihtiyaçlarını karşılamak için çamaşır satmaya başlamış.  Daha önceleri de bu işi yaptığından herhangi bir zorlukla karşılaşmamış.  Çevresine ,akrabalarına ve arkadaşlarına satış yapıyor.
Aldığı kredi ile iç çamaşırı alacak.  Ürün çeşidini arttıracak.Çocukları biraz daha büyüdüğünde kendine bir iç çamaşırı satacağı dükkan açmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy underwear and increase her selection.

loans.name: Hoda

texts.en: Hoda is a 51-year-old Lebanese married woman of two children who has been working for two years in the agriculture sector. She likes her occupation so much because she likes to feel her independence. Her husband has his own business as a carpenter concrete, and they cooperate to collect enough money to be able to pay the large life expenses. Today, Hoda is applying to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to purchase seeds for her business in order to improve it. She is very positive about her future and wishes to ameliorate her lifestyle.

loans.use: to purchase seeds for her business in agriculture.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more of goods and food for her shop.

loans.name: Mona

texts.en: Mona is a 47-year-old married mother of four children who has been working since ten years ago at her house selling homemade food in order to help her family to meet the needs of life and live in a good way. Today, Mona is obtaining a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to ameliorate her business' merchandise and to give the best product to its clients. She is very happy and optimistic that she will sell all products and expand her business area. She hopes that, in the future, she might open her own store and attract more customers.

loans.use: to ameliorate her business' merchandise.

loans.name: Fridah

texts.en:
Fridah is a married woman with four children, all of whom still attend school and are still under her care. They live at a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees for the children.

Fridah has operated a clothes-selling business, in which she sells dress materials at the market to her town-dwellers and her neighbors. She dreams of establishing a boutique in the future.

With the loan she is requesting, she wants to purchase two bales of dress materials for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase two bales of dress materials for resale.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es:
Jessica es una joven de 20 años, vive con su compañero e hija de un año en las casa de su padres, es una mujer que tiene muchas aspiraciones y deseos de superarse, además de visión empresarial. Su gusto por la fotografía la llevo a incursionar en esa área, luego de algunos cursos que recibió encontró en esa actividad la manera de auto emplearse, ayudar a su compañero con los gastos, y ser independiente económicamente. Actualmente quiere iniciar en el negocio de la serigrafía. También desea seguir estudiando para llegar a ser una fotógrafa profesional, así como trabajar en diseño gráfico.
Actualmente su patrimonio es pequeño, cuenta con lo básico para brindar los servicios de fotografía, su cámara y la computadora;  sus clientes son conocidos y familiares, que solicitan sus servicios de sesiones fotográficas para eventos especiales que van desde  familiares como fiestas e incluso para mujeres embarazadas, así como eventos laborales. Y el financiamiento representa la oportunidad para adquirir todo el equipo necesario para los servicios de serigrafía que comprende una máquina de sublimación para la serigrafía, y también una impresora especial para esa máquina.
texts.en:
Jessica is a 20-year-old young woman.  She lives with her partner and one-year-old daughter in her parents’ house.  She is a woman with a lot of aspirations and a desire to improve herself, along with an entrepreneurial vision.  Her love of photography lead her to dabble in that field.  After taking some courses, she found it to be a means of self-employment.  It also is a way to help her partner with expenses and to be financially independent.  Currently, she wants to start a serigraph business.  She also wants to keep studying to become a professional photographer and to work in graphic design.

At this point, her assets are minimal.  She has the basic necessities for offering photography services: her camera and computer.  Her clients are family members and acquaintances who request photography sessions for special family events such as parties and even pregnancies, as well as work events.  This loan represents an opportunity to get all the equipment needed for serigraph services, including a dye-sublimation machine and also a special printer for that machine.

loans.use: a dye-sublimation printer and a continuous ink printer, as well as t-shirts, caps, cups, cushions, and other items.

loans.name: Sameer

texts.en:
Sameer is a 39-year-old married man who lives with his family in Baqaa, Jordan.
5 years ago, he started to sell meat from chickens using his own special refrigerator to save the chickens while distributing them, but, because of the need for improvement and raising his income, he is seeking for a loan to enable him expand more and buy more variety of products to sell.

loans.use: to buy more variety of products and expand his projects.

loans.name: Deysi Marisol

texts.es:
Deyci vive con su esposo, su hija que está estudiando en un colegio fiscal y con su pequeño de 9 meses; juntos conforman una familia muy unida, todos viven en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Colorados, ciudad con clima cálido húmedo.
Su esposo es docente y también árbitro, pita partidos los fines de semana; mientras  Deyci se dedica a la venta ambulante de ropa, sandalias y productos naturales para la salud, su esposo también la apoya mucho. Son una familia muy sencilla y humilde, muy unidos; trabajan muy duro para sacar a sus hijos adelante.
Deyci con este crédito lo invertirá en ropa como pantalones, blusas y shores, desea surtir un poco su mercadería ya que son las fiestas de la ciudad y su clientela le solicita mucho.
Se siente muy feliz con la institución y con kiva por darle la oportunidad de crecer.
texts.en:
Deyci lives with her husband, her daughter who is in school, and her son who is nine months old. Together they form a tight-knit family, living in Santo Domingo de los Colorados, a city with a very warm climate. Deyci's husband is a teacher as well as a referee on weekends. Deyci makes a living selling clothing, sandals, and natural health products. Her husband is a big support for her. Their family is very close, simple, and modest. They work hard to help their children get head. 

With this loan, Deyci will invest in clothing such as pants, blouses, and shorts. She hopes to stock her store with merchandise because the the city's holidays are here and her customers are increasing demand. Deyci is very happy with the institution and with Kiva for giving her this chance to grow.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and stock her business.

loans.name: Gülşen

texts.en:
Gülşen is a 45-year-old, single, working mother. For five years she has been designing and producing jewelry. At first, she filled orders for stores and went on to sell to her friends and neighbors. 

With the loan from Maya, she’ll have a stand built in front of her house and she will buy materials. This will increase her potential customers. Gülşen is a hard-working person and her goal is to open a jewelry-making workshop.

Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff 
Gülşen Hanım, 45 yaşında tek başına çocuğunu büyütmeye çalışan bir anne. Gülşen hanım 5 yıldır hem takı tasarımı yapıyor hem de bunları üretiyor.  Önce mağazalardan aldığı siparişleri yapmış daha sonra  çevresine de yapıp satmaya başlamış.  Maya’dan aldığı kredi ile evinin önüne stant yaptırdı ve takı malzemesi aldı.  Böylece müşteri potansiyelini artırdı.  Çalışkan bir kişi olan Gülşen hanımın hedefi takı tasarım atölyesi açmak.

loans.use: to build a jewelry stand and buy materials.

loans.name: Diana Ysabel

texts.es:
Diana es una joven emprendedora, tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera y vive en Pachacamac junto a su familia.
Tiene un pequeño hijo quien es su mayor motivo para salir adelante, siendo madre soltera y muy joven tiene que ver la manera de sobresalir, es una persona muy fuerte e innovadora y poco a poco, con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logró aperturar un pequeño salón de belleza, le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, trabajadora y porque se ha preparado estudiando una carrera para poder ejercer esta ocupación.
Diana está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar tijeras, secadoras para implementar en su negocio y así poder tener más clientes y más ingresos. De esta manera podrá mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia con el dinero obtenido y seguirá luchando para poder cumplir su más grande sueño: "Ampliar su negocio".
texts.en:
Diana is an enterprising youth.  She is 20 years old, single, and lives in Pachacamac with her family.

Diana has a small child who is her main motivation to continue ahead.  Being a very young single mother, she had to find a way to survive.  She is a person who is very strong and innovative.  Gradually, with a lot of effort and dedication, she managed to open up a small beauty salon.  The business is doing very well, because she is very responsible and hardworking, and because she prepared herself to enter this occupation by studying for a degree.  

Diana is grateful to the Kiva lenders, because with the support that they are providing, she will be able to buy scissors and hair dryers to equip her business.  This way, she will have more customers and more income, and will be able to improve her family's quality of life with the money she obtains. She will continue to strive to make her greatest dream a reality: "to expand her business."

loans.use: to buy scissors and hair dryers for her beauty salon

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy sand, gravel, cement, galvanized sheet metal and wood to build a patio and water cistern.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es: Luz de 22 años de edad vive con su compañero de vida, su hija de 3 años de edad y 2 hermanos de 24 y 18 años de edad. Ella trabaja en el mercado central de su localidad  en un comedor tiene tres años de contar con dicho trabjao y así logra apoyar económicamente a su familia y junto a su compañero de vida quien trabaja como motorista mantienen la economía del hogar.Además, su hermano apoya en los gastos del hogar, son una familia muy unida. Luz esta solicitando un préstamo a FUSAI para comprar lamina, madera, vara de castilla, cemento, ladrillo, y madera para poder construir una pared y el techo de su vivienda que se encuentran deteriorados como se observa en la fotografía.
texts.en: Luz is 22 years old and lives with her life partner as well as her 3-year-old daughter and two siblings ages 24 and 18.  She works in the central market in her town in a restaurant and she has been working there for three years.  In this way she has been able to support her family economically, together with her partner who works as a driver. They sustain the family income.  In addition, her brother helps with household expenses, and they are a very close family.  Luz is asking for a loan from Kiva partner FUSAI in order to purchase wood, steel bars, roof tiles, cement, and bricks in order to construct a wall and a roof for her house, since the home has deteriorated as you can observe from the photograph.

loans.use: to purchase wood, steel bars, roof tiles, cement, and bricks in order to construct a wall and a roof for her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to plaster and paint the walls of his home

loans.name: Hawraa

texts.en:
Hawraa is a 29-year-old, Lebanese married woman, living with her husband and one child. She has operated a mini-market for seven years. She is a very hard worker and does not tire of work, with the aim to develop it and benefit from it. 

Today, Hawraa is requesting a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas s.a.l. to buy new merchandise for her business, to increase productivity and enhance her income. Hawraa insists that she will be a permanent customer, to always be able to develop her business.

loans.use: to buy new merchandise for her mini-market.

loans.name: Saida

texts.en:
Saida operates a grocery vegetables selling stall. Her main business challenge is the high cost of transportation to her place of operation. Saida appreciates for the support of the previous loan, which helped her to boost her business. 

With the loan of KES 20,000 she wants to purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes and onions for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: purchase green vegetables, two crates of tomatoes and onions

loans.name: Halima

texts.en:
Halima is married, with three children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

She operates a cashew nuts and coconuts business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. 

With the KES 50,000 loan, Halima wants to purchase seven sacks of cashew nuts and two sacks of coconuts to sell. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase seven sacks of cashew nuts and two sacks of coconuts to sell.

loans.name: Fatima De Jesus

texts.es: Fátima de 20 años de edad vive con sus padres y un hermano. Ella trabaja cuidando 2 niños durante la semana y los fines de semana presta sus servicios domésticos es una joven muy emprendedora que busca la manera de ayudar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar. Ha tomado la decisión de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que Fátima  esta solicitando un crédito a FUSAI para comprar cemento, grava, arena y pagar mano de obra para encementar el piso de la vivienda.
texts.en: Fátima is 20 years old and lives with her parents and one brother. Fátima works looking after two children during the week, and as a domestic servant at the weekend. Fátima is a very enterprising young woman who is looking to help her parents with household costs. Fátima has taken the decision to improve her living conditions and so has applied for a loan from "FUSAI" in order to buy cement, gravel and sand, and to pay labourers to cement the floor in her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel and sand, and to pay labourers to cement the floor in her house.

loans.name: Ruth Abigail's Group

texts.es:
EL GRUPO  MEJOR FUTURO  ESTA CONFORMADO  POR LA SRA. RUTH ES UNA MUJER  NACIDA  EN  CHICHIGALPA  (  TIERA DEL RON Y AZUCAR ) CASADA, TIENE 2 HIJOS, ES  TRABAJADORA, RESPONSABLE, SOLIDARIA, SU NEGOCIO  ES UNA TIENDA DE COSMETICOS  (  AVON  Y  ZELSA ) EL CUAL  LO INICIO  CON SU PROPIO  DINERO  Y  TIENE 11 AÑOS DE TENER EL NEGOCIO, CON LOS CREDITOS DE CEPRODEL PUSO UNA MINILIBRERIA EL CUAL LE HA HIDO BIEN , LA SRA. RUTH ESPERA PODER CUMPLIR SUS METAS CON APOYO DE CEPRODEL COMO  A LA FECHA DE HOY.    
LA SRA. FATIMA TAMBIEN HABITA EN EL MUNICIPIO DE CHICHIGALPA, ES  CASADA, TRABAJADORA,TIENE UNA HIJA ADOLESCENTE  EL  CUAL  LUCHA CADA DIA POR ELLA, SU NEGOCIO  ES LA VENTA DE LACTEOS   ( CREMA,  QUESO  FRESCO  Y  QUESO AHUMADO  FRESCO  ) EN  EL MERCADO MUNICIPAL  DESDE  HACE 4  AÑOS, TAMBIEN VENDE QUESO EN SU CASA.  LA SRA.FATIMA ESPERA TENER SIEMPRE EL APOYO DE KIVA PARA CUMPLIR SUS METAS.      
Y LA SRA.  FLOR HABITA EN EL MUNICIPIO DE CHICHIGALPA Y SU NEGOCIO ES UNA VENTECITA DE GRANOS BASICOS  (ARROZ, FRIJOLES, AZUCAR, ACEITE ETC. )DESDE HACE 8 AÑOS, CON LOS CRÉDITOS DE CEPRODEL HA SURTIDO SU VENTA Y ESPERA SIEMPRE EL APOYO DE CEPRODEL.
texts.en:
The "Mejor Futuro" group has Ruth as one of its members. Ruth was born in Chichigalpa (an area where much sugar and rum is produced). She is married and has two children. Ruth is hard-working, responsible and caring. She has a shop selling cosmetics (Avon and Zelsa goods), which she started with her own money. Ruth has had the business for 11 years. With Ceprodel she has installed a mini-bookshop which has gone well for her. Ruth is hoping to achieve her goals with the support of Ceprodel, which she is receiving today.

Fatima also lives in the municipality of Chichigalpa. She is married and hard-working. She has a teenage daughter, for whom she fights. Fatima has been selling dairy products (cream, fresh cheese and smoked choose) at the town market for four years. She also sells cheese at her home. Fatima hopes always to have the support of Kiva in order to achieve her goals.

Finally, Flor is also living in Chichigalpa, and has had a business selling basic items (rice, beans, sugar, oil and more) for eight years. Ceprodel loans have helped Flor to stock up her business and she hopes always to have Ceprodel's support.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and items for a bookshop.

loans.name: Gülhayat

texts.en:
Gülhayat, a university graduate, is a married mother of three. She has been selling Tupperware for 17 years. Before she got into this business, she used to be a troubled person who didn’t go out of the house alone. But one day she happened on a meeting of Tupperware sellers, joined the meeting out of curiosity, and then got into the Tupperware business herself. Today she is a senior manager, and next month she will become a distributor. With the loan from Maya, she will buy Tupperware products to sell. Having achieved her dreams, she wants to be a leader and to help other women who are at home with nothing to do, who are troubled, and who have difficulty making ends meet, by providing work for them. 

This Field Partner may choose to leave the local language description below the English one.Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff: Gülhayat Hanım evli ve üniversite mezunu üç çocuk annesi. On yedi yıldır Tupperware da satış yapıyor. Tupperware işine başlamadan önce tek başına sokağa çıkamayan, psikolojik sorunları olan bir kişi iken tesadüfen Tupperware cıların toplantısına denk geliyor. Merakdan toplantıya katılıyor ve Tupperware işine başlıyor. Bugün en üst düzey yönetici ve önümüzdeki ay dispirötörlüğe yükselecek. Aldığı kredi ile de Tupperware ürünleri alıp satacak. Tüm hayallerini gerçekleştirmiş ve şimdi evinde boş oturan, psikolojik sorunları olan, geçim sıkıntısı çeken kadınlara öncülük edip iş yapmalarını sağlamak, yardımcı olmak istiyor.

loans.use: buy Tupperware products for resale.

loans.name: Sumaiah

texts.en: Sumaiah is an ambitious married woman who lives with her family in Jabal Alhussein, Jordan. Six years ago she decided to contribute to the family income by starting to tailor kids’ clothes. Since she has learned to do good work and earned a favorable reputation, she is applying for a loan to expand her project and buy more yarns.  She seeks to open her own shop in the future

loans.use: to buy more yarns and expand her tailoring business.

loans.name: Arpik

texts.en:
Arpik lives in Shahumyan village in the Ararat region and works at "HAYPOST" CJSC. She lives with her husband and 29-year-old son. 

Her low salary has always forced Arpik to look for other revenue sources. Arpik's family has been engaged in farming for more than 10 years. They own a vineyard and also a greenhouse where they cultivate tomatoes and beans. Arpik's husband and son sell the agricultural products in local markets. 

With a perfect credit history, Arpik has now applied for a loan of USD 1,500 to expand her family's agribusiness. The requested amount will be used to buy fertilizers, pesticides, and fuel and to renovate the greenhouse. Let's help Arpik and her family implement their plans.

loans.use: to purchase pesticides, fertilizers, and fuel, and to renovate the greenhouse

loans.name: Maria Gilda

texts.es:
María es una señora viuda, vive junto a su única hija y sus nietas, juntas habitan en la ciudad de Santo Domingo de los Colorados, una ciudad conocida por ser muy comercial y productiva.
María es una señora muy alegre y carismática, desde hace varios años atrás ella se dedica  a la elaboración de muñecas de trapo, peluches, manteles y demás manualidades, obras que hace en una pequeña máquina de coser que posee. Mientras cuida a sus nietas por las tardes ella se dedica con mucho amor a este oficio, también desde hace algún tiempo vende también recargas para celulares, ingreso que le ayuda a mejorar y crecer.
El sueño de María es ponerse su propio negocio, ya que para vender su producto recorre a basares de la localidad. María podrá hacer su sueño realidad con este crédito ya que podrá adecuar un local en su casa, comprar unas vitrinas y mercadería para vender, así podrá crecer más en su negocio.
Se siente muy agradecida con la institución y con todas las personas que aportan a Kiva por hacer posible su sueño.
texts.en:
María is a widowed woman who lives together with her only daughter and her granddaughters. Together they live in the city of Santo Domingo de los Colorados, a city known for being very commercial and productive.

María is a very happy and charismatic woman. For many years she has made a living making rag dolls, stuffed animals, tablecloths, and other handicrafts, work that she does using a small sewing machine that she owns. While taking care of her granddaughters every afternoon, an activity which she does with a lot of love, she also has been selling cellphone chargers for some time, an income which helps her to improve and grow. 

María's dream is to establish her own business, since to sell her products she walks through the bazaars of her town. Maria will be able to make her dream a reality with this loan, as she will be able to adapt a store in her house, buy some display cases and merchandise to sell, and in this way will be able to grow more in her business.  

She feels very grateful to the institution and to all the people who contribute to Kiva for making her dream possible.

loans.use: to adapt a small store in her house and to buy showcases to display her handicrafts.

loans.name: Aynur

texts.en:
Aynur is married and has two children. She has been selling Tupperware for seven years. Since becoming a member of the Tupperware club, she has risen to the position of group leader. She wants to grow her business and to move up in the world. With the loan from Maya, she’ll be able to buy discounted products on special offer and make better profits when she sells them. Her biggest wish is to prove to herself, her husband and her children that she is succeeding in her business. With the money she earns, she wants to take her family on vacation. 

This Field Partner may choose to leave the local language description below the English one. Translated from Turkish by Maya Staff: 
Üyemiz evli ve iki çocuk annesi. Yedi yıldır Tupperware yapıyor. Üyelikle başladığı Tupperware işinde grup liderliğine yükselmiş. İşinde büyümek ve daha iyi yerlere gelmek istiyor. Aldığı kredi ile kanpanyalı ürünlerden uygun fiyata almak ve satışda daha çok kar elde ederek satmak. En büyük isteği kendini eşine ve çocuklarına ispatlamak başardığını göstermek. Kazancı ile ailesini tatile götürmek.

loans.use: to buy Tupperware products for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase many kinds of goods to meet all the demand from her customers.

loans.name: Benkadi B Group

texts.fr:
Les 10 membres du groupe  BENKADI B sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 43 ans, ont en moyenne 3 enfants et vivant la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles à ZERLABA un village dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du MALI.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est de riz avec madame MINATA YAYA débout à la première position de la gauche vers la droite sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme  BENKADI B. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 4 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 4 bidons d’herbicide, payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  1 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, à SIKASSO  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes au comptant et à crédit.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 140 000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et son intérêt, aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The ten members of the Benkadi B group are married women who on average are 43 years old with three children, living for the most part in traditional families in Zerlaba, a village in the Sikasso circle, the third administrative region of Mali.

They collaborate with the Soro Yiriwaso micro-finance institution in carrying out their farming activities during the rainy season. They are on their eighth agricultural loan cycle with the institution, and previous loans have been repaid in full.

The crop cultivated is rice featuring Mrs. Minata Yaya, who is standing in the first position from left to right in the photo of this Benkadi B group of women.

She will use her loan to buy four 50-kilo bags of fertilizer, four containers of herbicide, and pay plowing costs to maintain one hectare (about 2.47 acres).

After harvest the crop is sold at village level and in Sikasso, to a clientele composed of men and women, for cash and on credit.

She expects to make average profits of 140,000 CFA francs per crop year, which will enable her to pay off her loan and its interest, and help her husband with daily household expenses.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and herbicide, and pay for plowing

loans.name: Farah

texts.en: Farah is the 22-year-old married mother of one child. In 2012, she started her own job by setting up a small room in her house to prepare and sell homemade foods, in order to help improve her family’s way of life. Today she is applying to take out a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to improve her business merchandise, so she can offer the best products to her clients, earn extra money, sell more products and expand her business area. In the future, she plans to open her own shop.

loans.use: to improve her business merchandise.

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Carmen

texts.es: Guadalupe de 37 años de edad es una madre soltera que vive con su padre y su hija de 14 años de edad. Ella es una mujer emprendedora que se dedica a la venta de productos por catalogo de forma ambulante para mantener a su hija y su familia. Su casa vivienda es muy humilde a base de lamina la cual se encuentra deteriorada, cómo se observa en la fotografía. Ella está necesitando cambiarla lo antes posible pues esta en peligro su familia y sus pertenencias por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito para comprar lamina galvanizada, madera, clavos y tornillos y así contar con mas seguridad en su vivienda.
texts.en: Guadalupe is 37 years old and is a single mother who lives with her father and her 14 year old daughter.  She is an entrepreneurial woman who works selling products by catalog as a walking saleswoman in order to support her daughter and her family.  Her home is very humble and is made of metal sheets which have deteriorated over time, as you can see from the picture.  She needs to replace these as soon as possible since her family and their belongings are in danger.  For this reason she is asking for a loan from Kiva partner FUSAI in order to purchase galvanized metal sheets, wood, nails and screws and thus count on greater security for her home.

loans.use: to purchase galvanized metal sheets, wood, nails and screws to repair her home which is built out of sheet metal.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan es un joven emprendedor, tiene 20 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Pachacamac junto a su familia.
Es una persona con muchas ganas de salir adelante, desde hace casi 2 años trabaja en un Restaurante como repartidor de comida por Delivery, le va muy bien puesto que es muy responsable, trabajador, honesto y muy amable con los clientes. También se dedica a la venta de DVD, es un joven muy innovador y emprendedor.
Su familia es su mayor motivación a seguir adelante, es por ellos que a su corta edad se esfuerza mucho para poder apoyarlos en todo lo que pueda.
Juan está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá comprar un Blu Ray para su casa, de esta manera estará mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia y seguirá esforzándose para poder tener su propio negocio.
texts.en:
Juan is an enterprising young man.  He is 20 years old, single, and lives in Pachacamac with his family.  He is a person with a great desire to get ahead.  He has worked for a restaurant delivering food for almost two years.  It is going very well for him given that he is very responsible, hard-working, honest, and very kind to his customers.  He also sells dvd’s.  He is a very innovative and enterprising young man.

His family is his greatest motivation for getting ahead.  It is for them that, at such a young age, he puts forth a lot of effort in order to be able to support them in everything that he can.

Juan is grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the support they have given him he will be able to buy a Blu ray for his house.  This way he will be improving his family’s quality of life.  He will continue putting forth great effort in order to be able to have his own business.

loans.use: to buy Blu ray.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: Luisa de 65 años de edad vive con su esposo y una nieta de 10 años de edad. Ella es muy trabajadora, se dedica a la venta de leche de vaca y su hija la madre de la nieta que vive con ella emigro al extranjero y le ayuda económicamente, su esposo también trabaja de agricultor. Luisa necesita cambiar el techo de su vivienda por que ya se encuentra en muy malas condiciones, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar lamina galvanizada, madera y clavos y poder así mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.
texts.en: Luisa is 65 years old and lives with her husband and a ten-year-old granddaughter. Luisa is very hard-working and makes a living selling cow's milk. The mother of the granddaughter who lives with Luisa lives in abroad and supports her daughter financially. Luisa's husband works as a husband. Luisa needs to replace the roof on her home as it is currently in very bad condition. As a result, Luisa is applying for a loan from "FUSAI" in order to buy metal sheeting, wood and nails in order to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy metal sheeting, wood and nails in order to change the roof of her home.

loans.name: Percy

texts.es:
Percy es un joven trabajador, tiene 20 años de edad, es soltero y vive en Cieneguilla junto a su familia.
Es una persona muy entusiasta y con muchos deseos de superación. Desde hace más de 1 año trabaja brindando servicios de transporte a diferentes lugares de la ciudad a través de una mototaxi que posee. Le va muy bien porque es muy responsable, honesto, siempre tiene cuidado con los clientes y respeta todas las normas de tránsito.
Percy está agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado él podrá realizar el mantenimiento respectivo a su unidad de transporte para que de esta manera no tenga inconvenientes al momento de trasladar a los pasajeros. Así podrá obtener mayores ingresos y seguirá esforzándose día a día para poder cumplir su gran sueño: "Tener una flota de motos y ser un gran empresario".
texts.en:
Percy is a hardworking young adult. He is 20 years old, single, and lives with his family in Cieneguilla. He is an enthusiastic person who dreams of improvement. For over 1 year he has provided transportation services by his rickshaw to different places in the city. It is going well because he is responsible, honest, cares for his clients, and respects the traffic laws. 

Percy is thankful for Kiva loans because, with the help they have provided, he can maintain his transportation vehicle. This way, he will not have inconveniences while transporting passengers. Thus, he will be able to obtain better earnings and will continue working hard day by day to achieve his big dream: "To have a fleet of motorcycles and to be a great entrepreneur."

loans.use: with rickshaw maintenance.

loans.name: Benkadi G Group

texts.fr:
Les 9 membres du groupe  BENKADI G sont des femmes mariées  ayant une moyenne d’âge de 30 ans, ont en moyenne 2 enfants et vivant la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles à ZERLABA un village dans le cercle de SIKASSO 3ème région administrative du MALI.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de mener à bien leurs activités agricoles pendant l’hivernage. 
Elles sont à leur huitième prêt de campagne avec l’institution de microfinance soro yiriwaso, les prêts antérieurs ont été bien remboursés.
La spéculation cultivée est de riz avec madame ABY MADOU débout au milieu sur la photo dans ce groupe de femme  BENKADI G. 
Avec son prêt, elle compte acheter 2 sacs de 50 kg d’engrais, 1 bidon d’herbicide, payer les frais de labour pour entretenir  0,5 hectare. 
Après la récolte la production est vendue au niveau du village, à SIKASSO  à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes au comptant et à crédit.
Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 73 000 francs CFA par campagne.
Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer son prêt et son intérêt, aider son mari dans les dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
The nine members of the Benkadi G group are married women averaging  30 years of age, with two children. They mainly live in traditional families in Zerlaba, a village in the district of Sikasso, the third administrative region of Mali.
They collaborate with the Soro Yiriwaso microfinance institution in order to better manage their agricultural activities during the rainy season. They are on their eight agricultural loan with Soro Yiriwaso, having duly repaid their prior loans.
They grow rice, which is what Mrs.  Aby Madou does, for example. She is the  one standing in the middle in the group photo.

With her loan, she plans to buy two 50-kg [110 lbs] bags of fertilizers, 1 jug of herbicide and pay the cost of labor to work 0.5ha [1 acre] of land. After harvesting, she sells her produce at the village and in Sikasso, to a mixed clientele, for cash and on credit.
She plans to earn an average of 73,000 West African francs per agricultural cycle.
This revenue will allow her to pay off her loan with interest and also help her husband with everyday expenses.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizers, herbicides and the cost of labor.

loans.name: Alexandra Carolina

texts.es:
Alexandra es una madre muy trabajadora, para sacar a delante y darle la educación a sus tres pequeños ha trabajado duro, actualmente se dedica a dar servicio de tapizada para una empresa de fabricación de muebles, cuenta con un empleado, un joven que le ayuda ya que este trabajo no es tan fácil, mientras sus hijos acuden a la escuela ella se dedica a tapizar los muebles las mismas que son hermosas artes.
Alexandra se siente muy feliz  a pesar de su trabajo cansado, ya que por las tardes puede compartir con sus pequeños.
Con este crédito ella podrá comprar telas y esponja indispensable en su negocio, podrá surtir la variedad de tela y mejorar la calidad de muebles. Se siente muy agradecida por la oportunidad de crecimiento que le brindan y por el apoyo ya que mejoraran sus ingresos y con ello podrá darle la educación que sus hijos se merecen.
texts.en:
Alexandra is a hard-working mother. She has worked hard in order to help her three young children to prosper and to give them an education. Alexandra currently makes a living as an upholsterer for a furniture factory. She has an employee, a young man who helps her, as this work is not easy. While her children are at school, Alexandra works upholstering the beautiful pieces of furniture. 

Alexandra is happy in spite of her tiring job as in the afternoons she is able to spend time with her children.

With this loan, Alexandra will be able to buy basic supplies, such as material and foam which are indispensable for her business. She can stock up with a variety of materials and improve the quality of the furniture. Alexandra is very grateful for this growth opportunity and the support that she is being given. This loan will allow Alexandra to increase her income and give her children the education that they deserve.

loans.use: to buy basic supplies, such as material and foam which are indispensable for her business.

loans.name: Abdujalil

texts.ru: Абдучалил родился в 1963 году. Он трудолюбивый и образованный человек. Абдучалил работает преподавателем в средней школе. Он преподаёт в средней школе более 27 лет. Абдучалил кроме средней школы преподает и в колледже. Он очень хороший и опытный педагог. Абдучалил преподает математику. Абдучалил всегда старается для образования своих детей. Его дочь учится в Медицинском Колледже. Он должен оплатить учебный договор дочери и с такой целью он запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Abdujalil was born in 1963 and is a hard-working, educated man. He has been a high school teacher for over 27 years and also teaches at the university. He is a very good and experienced teacher of mathematics. Abdujalil always strives to educate his children. His daughter studies at the Medical College and he needs to pay for her tuition. This is why he is taking out a loan of 4,000 somoni. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for his daughter's tuition

loans.name: Emprendedoras De Casa Huerta Group

texts.es: “EMPRENDEDORAS DE CASA HUERTA” es un grupo conformada por socios dedicados al comercio minorista. Carmen tiene 52 años de edad es separada con hijos independientes. Ella se dedica a la confección y compostura hace 15 años. Años a otras se dedicaba a la venta de frutas zapatos. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de una remalladora pequeña. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Carmen es la quinta persona del lado derecho viste chompa roja
texts.en:
“EMPRENDEDORAS DE CASA HUERTA” is a group made up of members involved in retail commerce. Carmen is 52 years old, separated and has children who are now independent of her. She has been working in dressmaking and repairs for 15 years. Before that, she used to sell fruit and shoes. The loan will be used to buy a small specialist sewing machine. 

The group thanks the Kiva investors for the credit given. Carmen is the fifth person from the right, wearing a red sweater

loans.use: to buy a small specialist sewing machine

loans.name: Juana Jacqueline

texts.es: Juana Jacqueline 32 años de edad casada con un hijo menor de edad originaria de uno de los municipios de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país,se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora, trabajadora, responsable, es una microempresaria  la cual posee en su casa de habitación una mini pulperia donde ofrece productos de consumo diario como: golosinas, sopas maruchan, salsas de tomates, papel higiénicos, toallas sanitarias, huevos, galletas, sardinas, leña, bananos verdes, frescos, gaseosas, jugos, granos básicos entre otros mas, sus compras son al contado en camiones distribuidores y mercados de mayoreo, las ventas son al contado y en algunas ocasiones al crédito a clientes fijos, inicia este negocio con el animo de ayudar con los gastos del hogar y así poder sacar adelante a su hijo aprende esta actividad y hasta la fecha a sido una fuente segura de ingresos y fuente de trabajo para ella, lo inicia con fondos propios hace cuatro años atrás y con los créditos obtenidos ha ido logrando poco a poco incrementar el inventario así como tambien su capital de trabajo uno de sus sueños es poder mejorar su casa de habitación y brindarle un techo digno donde vivir a su hijo, tambien el de ampliar su negocio. el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en capital de trabajo e invertir en la compra de productos de consumo como:arroz, azúcar, frijoles, golosinas, gaseosas, entre otros.
texts.en:
Juana Jacqueline is 32 years old, married, and has one young son. She is from one of the municipalities of Chinandega, located in the west of the country. She is known to be an entrepreneurial, hardworking, and responsible woman; she is a small businesswoman who runs a small grocery store out of her home, where she offers everyday products such as candy, instant soup, tomato sauce, bathroom tissue, feminine products, eggs, crackers, sardines, firewood, green bananas, soda, mineral water, juice, basic grains, and much more.

Her products are purchased in cash through distribution trucks and wholesale markets; her sales are made in cash, and on some occasions through credit with stable clients. She began this business with the intention to help with household expenses and to be able to move her son forward. She learned about the business, and so far this has been a secure source of income and work for her. She began with her own funds four years ago and with the loans she has obtained, she has been able to increase inventory and capital little by little.

One of her dreams is to be able to improve her home and to be able to provide a dignified place where her son can live. She also wants to grow her business. The objective of this financing is to invest in work capital and invest in the purchase of everyday products such as rice, sugar, candy, sodas, and more.

loans.use: to buy everyday products such as: rice, beans, cooking oil, candy, frozen goods, and more.

loans.name: Barnabas

texts.en:
Lenders! Kindly meet Barnabas, a 37-year-old active and hardworking man who resides in the Kitale area of Kenya, an area known to experience the best weather patterns and also known as the bread basket of Kenya. He is a family man, and he cherishes his wife and four kids.

Barnabas has been practicing farming for the past 10 years, and he has been able to take care of his family. Throughout the 10 years that he has practiced farming, Barnabas has been able to gather a lot of experience in farming and all the farming techniques are at his fingertips.

Being a responsible man who cherishes his family, Barnabas wants to see his family grow economically and also have an impact in society, so he wants to increase his farming business. This is why he is seeking a loan of KES 52,000 to be able to buy a dairy cow, which would in return increase his milk production levels. The cow dung from the cow will be used as fertilizer in his small kitchen garden, where he grows vegetables to sell and for home consumption.

Barnabas is very comfortable with the repayment period and monthly installments, and his projections are that he will be able to clear the loan even before the due date.

Through the loan Barnabas would be able to sell milk to his neighbors and also to the nearby villages, hence generating a lot of profit which would result in a better living condition for his family and the society.

Barnabas's target and dream is to open a milk processing plant once he has accumulated more funds.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Cleophas

texts.en:
Cleophas is a 52-year-old farmer who resides in the Nyamira area of Kenya, a very fertile place that is blessed with favorable weather patterns. He is someone who cherishes his family and is blessed with four adorable children and one wife. All through his life Cleophas has been practicing farming and has been doing this for 36 years.

Through farming he has been able to earn a decent and honest living and take care of all the basic needs of his family. Cleophas' sources of income are milk, tea, crops, and personal business and through this he is able to make a good profit.

Cleophas is seeking a loan of KES 31,200 to be able to purchase a dairy cow that will help him generate more income through selling milk and selling manure to his neighbors. Through these two ventures of selling milk and manure, he will be able to generate more income and take care of his family and give his family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Geogina Myrna

texts.es: Geogina Myrna, mayor de edad soltera con siete hijos todos mayores de edad, originaria del municipio de Chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, zona que se caracteriza por ser productivamente comercial, turística, es una microempresaria que posee en su casa de habitación un taller de tortillas y ventas de frijoles cosidos, inicia su jornada diaria desde un día antes comenzando a nisquezar el maíz, y empezar desde las 4:00 am con ir a moler el maíz y luego palmear las tortillas, y mas tarde pone a coser los frijoles,los cuales elabora en tres tiempos que son 4,10 am y 5:30pm, el cual tiene mas de 20 años de dedicarse a este negocio, inicia su negocio con capital propio al ver la necesidad de los habitantes del barrio,y el querer sacar adelante a sus hijos en vista que era madre soltera a la vez  miro que era rentable y con poco capital empiezas y poco a poco ha venido creciendo en sus negocios,  sus compras las realiza al contado en mercados y distribuidoras de la localidad, tiene clientes fijos y eventuales, Geogina se caracteriza por ser una mujer fuerte, trabajadora, responsable y con muchos deseos de superación personal ella sola ha sacado adelante a sus hijos y uno de sus sueños es poder ver su negocio crecer mas y realizar ciertas mejoras  a su vivienda que es lo que en un futuro dejara a sus hijos , el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en sus negocios para capital de trabajo en la compra de insumos que utiliza a diario en su negocio como: maíz, frijoles, leña, cal, ajo, sal, entre otros mas debido a que su demanda es bastante grande y de esa forma tendrá mas utilidades en sus negocios
texts.en:
Geogina, a single woman with seven grown children, is originally from the municipality of Chinandega, located in the western part of the country. This area is known for being commercially and touristically productive. 

Geogina is a small business owner who makes tortillas in her home and sells cooked beans. She starts her work every day the night before by cooking corn in ash, and she starts at 4:00am grinding corn and forming tortillas. Later she cooks the beans, which she prepares between 4:10am and 5:30pm. She has worked in this business for more than 20 years. She initially started her business with her own capital when she saw the need that existed within her neighbors, and she wanted to help her children to get ahead being a single mother. At the same time, she saw that it was a profitable business, and with just a small amount of capital one can get started, and her business has slowly grown. She makes her purchases in cash in the markets and distributors in her area, and she has steady and eventual clients. 

Geogina is known for being a strong, hardworking and responsible woman who really wants to get ahead. She has gotten her children ahead all by herself, and one of her dreams is to be able to watch her business grow even more. She would also like to make some improvements to her home, which she will leave to her children in the future.

The purpose of this loan is to invest in her business for working capital to purchase daily needs such as corn, beans, firewood, lime powder, garlic and salt, among others because the demand for her products is fairly large, and this way she will earn more from her business.

loans.use: to invest in working capital to purchase daily needs such as corn, lime powder, salt, firewood, beans and garlic, among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a motorbike to deliver milk and eggs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase zinc sheets and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: Noah

texts.en:
Wonderful people! Meet Noah, a hardworking and strong man who hails from the Molo area in Kenya. This is an area well-known to be fertile, and it has favorable weather patterns that support farming. Noah is a very young and ambitious person, being only 20 years of age, and his goal in life is to succeed. That’s what keeps him moving.

After finishing his high school, Noah decided to venture into farming. He has been doing farming for the past three years. Because of a lack of financial resources he was not able to go to college, but that did not kill his dream. He has been saving money for college fees, through farming.

Noah is seeking a KES 20,000 loan. The loan will enable him to start poultry farming, so that he can accumulate more profits and save more. Then he may be able to achieve his dream of going to college. Through the profits he will accumulate, Noah is sure that he will repay the loan, pay his tuition, and be able to improve his living conditions and help his parents.

loans.use: to buy poultry and begin poultry farming

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothes to resell.

loans.name: Hyline

texts.en:
Good people! Meet Hyline, a mother of four cute babies, who lives in the Nyamira area of Kenya. This area is known to be a very fertile area although the population rate is very high. But that does not prevent farmers there from being productive because they are experiencing favorable weather patterns. Hyline, being a hardworking farmer, is able to take care of her family single handedly and provide them with the basic needs including food, shelter, clothing and education. She has been practicing farming for the past eight years and throughout those years, she has gained so much experience in farming and dairy farming. Even though Hyline is hardworking, she has one problem, which is the lack of funds to improve her livestock on the farm. That is why she is seeking a loan of KES 20,800 to purchase a dairy cow. The dairy cow will assist her in increasing her income through selling milk to the nearby neighbors and villages. In addition, with the dairy cow, she is able to get manure that will be used on her arm.

Hyline will be able to pay the loan without defaulting and promises to pay the loan on time because she is very comfortable with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Kiva lenders! Meet Veronica, a hardworking and passionate farmer who is the mother of five children. She resides in the Kisii area of Kenya, an area that never lacks rainfall and is one of the fertile places on earth. Veronica enjoys farming a lot and she has been doing this for the last five years and each year she has been making more and more strides. Through farming Veronica has been able to earn an honest living.

Her primary sources of income are dairy farming, egg farming and through a small salary that she gets.

Veronica is seeking a loan of KES 41,600 to be able to buy a dairy cow and be able to increase the number of dairy cows that she has. Veronica has identified space on her farm and would like to utilize this by keeping another dairy cow.

By keeping the dairy cow, Veronica will be able to reap more profit through selling milk to her increasing clients.

Through this loan Veronica's life will be transformed and this is all what Kiva lenders are all about “improving living standards of small farmers”.

From the profits that she will generate through milk selling she will be able to finance the loan comfortably and better her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Celestine

texts.en:
KIVA LENDERS! Meet Celestine, a humble, honest, caring and hardworking mother of three lovely children. She hails from the Nandi hills area of Kenya, a place known to have good climatic conditions for farming. Celestine has been doing farming for the past 14 years and has been able to take care of her children.
 
Being a single mother, she has to work extra hard so that she can put food on the table for her children. Through hard work, persistence and patience, she practices mixed farming and has even been able to buy a cow that she has nicknamed “cheseker”. This dairy cow is one of the most important things that Celestine treasures and adores a lot because of the profits that she gets from selling milk.

Celestine has one problem: this cow does not have a cow unit where it can rest or graze and be milked, which is reducing her milk production. Therefore, she is seeking a loan of KES 50,000 to buy a cow unit. With the cow unit, the cow will improve its milk production and this will mean more money and profits.

Through the profits generated, Celestine will be able to secure the future of her children and assure them of a bright future through giving them a solid education.

Celestine is sure of paying the loan on time and she has a long-term goal of keeping more dairy cows.

loans.use: To build a cow unit

loans.name: Araz

texts.en:
Araz is 23 years old. He is an IDP from Fuzuli city, and now is living in Boyuk Bahmanli village of the Fuzuli region. He is single and is living with his parents and sister. 

Two years ago he started an agriculture business, which he learned from his father. 

Today Araz wants to support his new business, and for that he needs a loan in amount of 1,000 Azerbaijan New Manat. With this amount, Araz is planning buy more calves. 

He says great thanks for the loan for the Kiva organization. 

In the future he wants to get married.

loans.use: calves

loans.name: Eldar

texts.en:
Eldar is a 56-year-old married father of four kids. He works as a laborer on a water project team. They build water channels for their region and crop fields. He has been working in this project for three years and his monthly income is 80 AZN.

Azerbaijan develops very fast and every year many regions have many changes. One of the most important parts of life in each region is water. Young people take part in water projects in order to build water channels and make life in the region better. Eldar’s income isn’t enough to cover his family’s demands and the team has to improve the project in order to increase the income. He applied for 500 AZN loan in order to buy good coveralls and quality tools for his work. Eldar only hopes that Kiva will help him in this business .He awaits your support.

loans.use: to buy good coveralls and quality tools for his  work

loans.name: Mahfuza

texts.ru: Махфуза родилась в 1995 году. Она молодая и энергичная женщина. Махфуза замужем, но не имеет детей. Она начала свой бизнес выращиванием виноградника. Махфуза имеет 50 соток земли, где выращивает виноградник. Махфуза выращивает многие сортов винограда и продает на местном рынке. Ее муж помогает ей введению бизнеса. Махфуза постепенно изучает тонкости своего бизнеса и изучает рынок. Она должна купить минеральные удобрения для виноградников, чтобы получить хороший урожай, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 1500 сомони для покупки минеральных удобрений. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mahfuza was born in 1995. She is an energetic young woman who is married but has no children. She started a vineyard on 0.5 hectares of land where she grows many varieties of grapes and sells them in the local market. Her husband helps her with the business. Mahfuza is getting to know the nuances of the business and is exploring the market. She needs to buy mineral fertilizers to get a good crop but does not have enough money. She is requesting a loan of 1,500 somoni to buy the fertilizers. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Gafurjon

texts.ru:
Гуфрончон один из многих, которые нуждается в дополнительных средствах, в  материальной помощи и поддержке. Его поиски в этом направлении привели его МДО «Арванд». Раньше он никогда не кредитовался. Только пару раз занимал у друзей и родственников, но возвращал чужое «добро» быстро и своевременно, так как является порядочным и не хочет, чтобы его за спиной упрекали его долгами. Обратится в  МДО «Арванд» ему посоветовала его знакомая, которая нашла поддержку со стороны «Кива» и организации. Теперь Гуфрончон хочет получить кредит. Эти деньги нужны ему на продвижение своего бизнеса. Хочет в очередной раз съехать в Кыргизию и от туда закупить напитки и продавать их в местных рынках.
 У Гуфрончона год опыта работы в сфере поставщика напитков. 
Также Гуфрончон очень хороший семьянин. У него трое прекрасных детей. У него высшее образование, но на данный момент не работает  по специальности. Сам он 1978 года рождения. Молодой и перспективный человек очень надеется на поддержку от Кива. Гуфрончон заранее благодарит всех за участие в продвижении его бизнеса и искренне желает всем процветания.
texts.en:
Gufronjon is one of many who needs additional income in the form of financial assistance and support. His search for such funding lead him to MDO "Arvand." He had never taken out a loan before. He borrowed from friends and family just a few times. However, he returned this borrowed money quickly and on-time as it was it was the right thing to do and he did not want people talking about him behind his back because of his debts He was advised to turn to Arvand by an acquaintance of his who had previously received support from Kiva and Arvand. Now Gufronjon wants to take out a loan. He needs this money for the advancement of his business.  He wants to yet again drive to Kyrgyzstan to buy beverages and then sell them at local markets. Gufronjon has one year of work experience as a beverage supplier.

Gufronjon is also an excellent family man. He has three wonderful children. He has a higher education but is not currently working in the field of his degree. He was born in 1978. This promising young man relies on support from Kiva. Gufronjon thanks everyone in advance for their participation in the advancement of his business. He sincerely wishes prosperity for everyone.

loans.use: to buy beverages to resell at local markets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more peanut and palm oil to expand her business.

loans.name: Samvel

texts.en:
Samvel lives in Yerevan. Samvel's parents are abroad, which is why he lives with his uncle's family. Samvel studies at the University of Law and Economics at Avetik Mkrtchyan. He is currently in his fourth year of study in the Department of Land Cadastre. Samvel also works at an airport to cover his living expenses and help his uncle's family. 

It is really hard for this 22 year old young man to combine his job with his studies, but he does everything he can to make ends meet. Because of financial difficulties, Samvel is not able to save money for his education. This is why he is asking for this loan. With the help of the loan, he will be able to cover his university tuition.

loans.use: to pay for university tuition

loans.name: Mrika

texts.en: Mrika built a stable with her previous loan. Yet, this past year, she hasn't been feeling well from her kidneys. Specialists said that she needs immediate intervention and this is the reason why she is asking for your kindness.

loans.use: to pay for a medical procedure in her kidneys

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase more of ready-made women clothes, accessories, and make up

loans.name: Sabah

texts.en:
Sabah is a conservative lady. So she asked her husband to take her place in the picture. Sabah is a 39-year-old married woman who lives with her family in Ajloun,Jordan.

After her husband retired 7 years ago and opened a shop to fulfill the family expenses, she now seeks to support her husband with buying more materials and goods for the shop so that she will raise his profit and expand the shop. But she doesn't have enough money to do so. For that, she has applied for this loan.

loans.use: To buy more materials and goods for the shop

loans.name: Pamella

texts.en:
Pamella is 52-years-old and married to Charles.  They are blessed with three children ages 26, 24, 20 and 18-years-old.  For the last 24 years, Pamella has been offering tailoring services and besides that, she sells paraffin as a second business.  She earns a monthly profit of KES 15,000.

She has applied for a second loan of KES 45,000 after paying back her previous loan successfully and plans to use the entire loan amount to buy more fabric materials and threads to make dresses.  She will use the anticipated profits to renovate her house.

Pamella hopes to grow her business and in the future, open a paraffin pump station and be financially stable.

loans.use: to buy more paraffin and fabric materials to make dresses

loans.name: Zula

texts.en:
Zula lives in Uganda, Kampala. She is married with two children and all of them go to school. She has additional family members. She makes pancakes, cassava and irish chips, and chapati. She works seven days a week.  She has been in this business for five years. She has requested a loan of 700,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT – SACCO to buy cooking oil, cassava, irish potatoes, and baking flour. 

Her major challenge includes seasonality.  Her goal and aspiration is to build a residential house. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity and piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: To buy cooking oil, baking flour, irish potatoes, and cassava

loans.name: Gohar

texts.en:
Gohar is self-employed and from the Armash village of Ararat region. She lives there with her husband and three children (2 sons and 1 daughter). Gohar's family has been running a farm for many years. They own a greenhouse and also an orchard where they grow peaches, apples, and pears. They sell the agricultural products in the local markets. 

For the purpose of expanding the agribusiness a little bit, Gohar has applied for a loan of USD 3,000. This amount will be used to finance the soil-plowing process and buy fertilizers and pesticides. This hard working family really hopes for lenders' support and goodwill.

loans.use: to finance soil-plowing activities and purchase fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Melvin Elías

texts.es:
Melvin de 33 años de edad, es un hombre esforzado y trabajador, estudió hasta los primeros años de secundaria, es líder en su comunidad y está felizmente acompañado, su mujer se dedica al cuido de la casa y también es la encargada de darle el mantenimiento a una pequeña granja de pollos que tienen en la casa. Tienen un niño pequeño al cual lo quieren mucho.

Melvin trabaja como jornalero en una hacienda que se encuentra cercana a la comunidad, se levanta temprano todos los días y camina unos 15 minutos para llegar a ella, y cuando el sol se está escondiendo retorna a su casa. También, a parte Melvin siembra maíz, de donde obtiene otros ingresos así como con la granjita que tienen en casa.

El préstamo que está solicitando a CREDICAMPO,  es para cambiar la cama para los pollos, puesto que es la época lluviosa y necesita la mayor higiene para mantener sanos a los animalitos. También necesita comprar, abono, pesticidas y herbicidas para su cultivo de maíz.  

Melvin sueña con ver a su comunidad crecer, para que cada familia goce de una buena calidad de vida. También aspira con tener una granja de pollos más grande, con la cual no necesite trabajar para otro y que sea auto sostenible.
texts.en:
Melvin, 33 years old, is a courageous and hard-working man. He studied until the first years of high school. He is a leader in his community and is in a happy relationship. His partner is engaged in taking care of the house and is also in charge of maintaining a small chicken farm that they have in the house. They have a small child whom they love very much.

Melvin works as a laborer in a farm that is close to the community. He gets up early every day and walks some 15 minutes to get to it. When the sun is going down, he returns home. Also, apart from this, Melvin sows corn, from which he obtains another income like the small farm that they have at home.

The loan that he is requesting from CrediCampo is to change the bedding for the chickens since it is the rainy season and he needs the best hygiene to maintain the health of the small animals. He also needs to purchase fertilizer, pesticides, and herbicides for his corn crop.

Melvin dreams of seeing his community grow, for which each family enjoys a good quality of life. He also aspires to having a larger chicken farm with which he does not need to work for another and sustains itself.

loans.use: to change the bedding for his chickens since it is the rainy season and he needs the highest hygiene to maintain the health of the little animals; he also needs to purchase fertilizer, pesticides, and herbicides for his corn crops.

loans.name: Aquileo De La Cruz

texts.es: Aquileo de la Cruz mayor de edad casado con dos hijos mayores de edad originario de unos de municipios del norte de chinandega ubicado en el occidente del país, zona que se caracteriza por ser productivamente comercial, ganadera, explotación de oro, entre otros mas, Aquileo es un microempresario y administrador de su propio negocio pulperia donde ofrece productos de consumo como: golosinas, gaseosas, jugos, medicamentos, bolsitas de shampoo, aceite, arroz, azúcar, taollas sanitarias, papel higiénicos, tomates, cebollas, pan simples, dulces y tostados, entre otros mas, inicia su negocio con unos ahorros que había juntado cuando trabaje en cortes de caña en tiempo de zafras, tuve que emigrar a otro país, porque no tuve formación académica fue alfabetizado debido a que sus padres eran de escasos recursos económicos muy humilde pero les enseñaron a trabajar, y de esa manera ha podido criar a sus hijos que tampoco les dio estudios pero si aprendieron a trabajar igual que el, uno de sus sueños es poder ver que su  negocio crezca para que pueda generar más ingresos al hogar y apoyar a sus hijos, hacer unas mejoras en su casita también, el objetivo de este financiamiento es para invertir en la compra de productos de consumo del hogar, como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles,  aceite, detergentes, productos congelados, shampoo, bolsitas de avena, cebada, entre otros mas.
texts.en:
Aquileo de la Cruz is an adult, married with two adult children and comes from one of the northern municipalities of Chinandega, located in the west of the country, an area that is characterized by being productive in commerce, livestock and gold mining, among others.

Aquileo is a micro-businessman and runs his own grocery store which offers products such as sweets, fizzy drinks, juices, medicine, sachets of shampoo, oil, rice, sugar, sanitary towels, toilet paper, tomatoes, onions, bread, pastries and toast. 

He began his business with some savings that he gathered while working cutting cane in the sugar harvest. He had to emigrate to another country, because he had no formal training. He was literate because his parents were very humble with poor economic resources, but they taught him to work. Because of this, he has been able to raise his children who also have not studied but learned to work like him.

One of his dreams is to see his business grow so that he can generate more income for the household, support his children and also make some improvements to his small house. 

The purpose of this funding is to invest in the purchase of household products such as rice, sugar, beans, oil, detergents, frozen products, shampoo, bags of oats and barley.

loans.use: to buy products such as rice, sugar, beans, oil, detergent, sweets and frozen goods

loans.name: Anna

texts.en:
Hello! Meet Anna who hails from Eldoret area of Kenya, where they say that in every 10 people you meet, 2 are athletes.  That is why it’s called Home of Champions.

Anna is a hardworking and dedicated mother of four lovely children and she practices farming. She has been farming for the past 4 years and her primary source of income is milk, eggs, crops and personal business.  Anna has a lot of desire to succeed that is why she tries to diversify her farming through rearing chickens and crop farming. Anna has been able to diligently take care of her family's needs and make sure that her children go to school.

Anna is kindly requesting a loan of KES 67,400 to be able to buy a dairy cow and dairy feed. She has a strong belief that the extra income she will get from dairy farming will allow permanent changes to her life and increase her business.

Through dairy farming Anna will be able to sell more milk and this will translate to more income, hence, improved standards of living.  Anna’s projections are that through the loan, her business will increase more than ever and her family will not lack the basic needs, hence, improving her living standards

loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a goat

loans.name: Amparo

texts.es:
La señora Amparo de 49 años de edad, vive con su esposo e hijos en su casa propia, se dedica desde hace 2 años al negocio de venta de abarrotería, en su negocio ella vende  frescos, churros, frijoles, arroz,  lácteos, jabón, pollo,  etc. Radica en la cuidad de san Lorenzo al sur de honduras, ella es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante y lucha día con día para mejorar su calidad de vida. 
Doña Amparo esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos para surtir la pulpería,  como pollo, arroz, frijoles, maseca, manteca, jabón, frescos, churros, pan, café, lácteos, embutidos, etc. con el apoyo de este crédito ella pretende mejorar sus ingresos y también su calidad de vida, es un cliente nuevo con deseos de trabajar con Prisma y KIVA.
Su sueño es tener un buen negocio y bien surtido, y al mismo  tiempo mejorar su futuro junto a su familia.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio de 2014
texts.en:
Sra. Amparo is 49 years old and lives with her husband and children in a house they own. For two years she has had a business selling groceries. In her store she sells soft drinks, “churros” (fried snacks), beans, rice, dairy products, soap, chicken, etc. She lives in the city of San Lorenzo in the south of Honduras. She is an entrepreneurial woman who wants to get ahead and who struggles day after day to improve her quality of life.

Doña Amparo is requesting the loan to purchase products to supply her small store, such as chicken, rice, beans, Maseca brand flour, butter, soap, soft drinks, churros, bread, coffee, dairy products, sausages, etc. With the support of this loan she will improve her earnings and also her quality of life. She is a new client who wants to work with Prisma and KIVA.

Her dream is to have a good, well-stocked business and at the same time to improve her and her family’s future.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - June, 2014

loans.use: to purchase chicken, rice, beans, Maseca brand flour, butter, soap, soft drinks, snacks, bread, coffee, dairy products, sausages, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Claudia Lorena

texts.es:
La señora  CLAUDIA de 31 años de edad , vive sola no tiene  conyugue y tiene un  hijo  que  dependen de ella, radica en la comunidad de san Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, vive en casa  propia , y se dedica desde hace 04 años al negocio de venta de ropa usada  su negocio lo realiza de forma ambulante, ella se desplaza por las aldeas y caseríos de la zona para vender la ropa.
Claudia está solicitando el préstamo para comprar un fardo de ropa clasificada, como faldas, pantalones y ropa de niño,  Con el apoyo del préstamo ella  mejora su negocio y tendrá mejores ganancias al igual su sueño es mejorar su casita.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2014.
texts.en:
Claudia is 31 years old. She doesn't have a spouse, so she lives alone with her child, who is her only dependent. She resides in the community of San Lorenzo, in southern Honduras. She lives in her own home and has been working selling used clothing for the past four years. She runs her business as a street vendor, traveling to local villages and communities to sell her clothing.

Claudia is requesting this loan to buy a bale of sorted clothing like skirts, pants, and children's clothing. This loan will allow her to improve her business and make higher earnings. Her dream is also to improve her little house. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - June, 2014

loans.use: to buy skirts, pants, and children's clothing for her business.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
La joven Claudia de 28  años  de edad es soltera no tiene hijos   vive con sus  padres  en su casa de habitación, se dedica desde hace 03 ½  años al negocio de venta de abarrotería en su negocio ubicado en el barrio  Morazán  de Nacaome , valle  al sur de Honduras, en su negocio ella vende todo lo relacionado a la canasta familiar, es una mujer trabajadora y muy emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante, ella vende de todo y gracias a su actividad ella ha podido salir adelante en sus estudios ya que va a la universidad y pronto se estará graduando, también vende golosinas los fines de semana ya que es una mujer muy creativa y le gusta el negocio.
Ella está solicitando el préstamo para compra de frescos, embutidos,  carnes, manteca, aceites, lácteos, pan, café, azúcar, frijoles y otros productos basicos. Con el apoyo del crédito ella mejorara sus ingresos y su negocio, está muy contenta de seguir trabajando con Prisma y Kiva. 
Su sueño es terminar su carrera y ejercer su profesión.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2014.
texts.en:
Claudia is a 28 year old young woman.  She is single and does not have children.  She lives in her parents’ house.  She has been working in her business selling groceries for three and half years.  Her business is located in the Morazán de Nacaome neighborhood, a valley in southern Honduras.  She sells everything having to do with basic food needs in her business.  She is a hard-working woman.  She is very enterprising, and she wishes to get ahead.  She sells everything.  Thanks to her business activity she has been able to get ahead in her education.  She goes to the university and she will soon be graduating.  She sells candy on the week-ends.  She is a very creative woman, and she likes the business.

She is requesting a loan to buy soft drinks, sausages, meat, shortening, cooking oil, dairy products, bread, coffee, sugar, beans, and other basic products.  With the support of the loan she will improve her income and her business.  She is very happy to continue working with Prisma and Kiva.  Her dream is to finish her degree and exercise her profession.

San Lorenzo, Honduras – June, 2014

loans.use: to buy stock for her business.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Cristina de 48 años  de edad,  vive con sus hijos y su conyugue en su casa de habitación, desde hace unos, se dedica desde hace 05 años al negocio de venta de jugos y sándwich, su venta es de forma ambulante ella recibe el apoyo de su esposo en su negocio ya que entre los dos han sabido generar ingresos para mantenerse. Ella es una mujer trabajadora con deseos de salir adelante.
Esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de agua, frutas, una hielera, un carretón, bolsas plásticas, azúcar, etc., con el apoyo del préstamo ella pretende mejorar sus ingresos  su sueño es mejorar su negocio y tener una mejor casa es su segundo crédito que solicita, y se siente muy contenta de trabajar con Prisma y Kiva.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2014.
texts.en:
Cristina is 48 years old and has been living with her children and spouse in their home for some years. For five years she has had a business selling juices and sandwiches as a street vendor. Her husband helps her with her business as between the two of them they have learned to generate income to support themselves. She is a hard-working woman with a desire to succeed

She is requesting the loan in order to buy water, fruit, a cooler, a cart, plastic bags, sugar, etc. With the help of the loan, she intends to improve her income. Her dream is to improve her business and have a better home. This is the second loan she is applying for and she is very happy working with Prisma and Kiva.  

San Lorenzo, Honduras - June  2014

loans.use: To purchase water, food, a cooler, a cart, plastic bags, sugar, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Ena Yadira

texts.es:
La señora ENA de  43  años de edad, no tiene hijos que dependen de ella, vive con su conyugue, en su casa, radica en la comunidad de el comercio san Lorenzo, Valle al sur de Honduras, y se dedica desde hace 03  años  al negocio de venta de detergentes, su venta es con los amigos, vecinos, y personas que ella visita a diario en los caseríos aledaños a su comunidad, también sale a vender fuera de su comunidad con la ayuda de su hijo que también se genera ingresos del negocio de Doña Ena para mantener su familia.
Doña Ena esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de productos como detergente, cloro blanqueador, jabón de baño, pasta dental y papel higiénico, con el apoyo del préstamo ella venderá mas y tendrá mejores ganancias que se convertirán en mejoras para su hogar, es un cliente sub siguiente  que solicita su tercer  préstamo a Prisma y Kiva, para capital de trabajo ya que con este préstamo podrá hacer la inversión en productos para la venta.
Doña Ena su sueño es tener más surtido su negocio y emplear a una persona más ya que por medio de su negocio quiere generar empleo para ayudar a su familia.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Junio del 2014.
texts.en:
Ena is 43 years old. She has no dependent children and lives with her spouse in their home. She resides in the community of San Lorenzo, in a valley in southern Honduras, and has been working selling detergents for the past three years. Her customers are her friends, neighbors, and people whom she visits daily in nearby communities. She also travels outside her community with help from her son, who also makes an income from Ena's business in order to support his family.

Ena is requesting this loan to buy products like detergent, bleach, bath soap, toothpaste, and toilet paper. This loan will allow her to make more sales and have higher earnings, which she will use to improve her home. She is a recurring client who is requesting her third loan from Prisma and Kiva to increase her working capital. This loan will allow her to invest in more products to sell.

Ena's goal is to better stock her business and be able to hire another employee. She wants her business to create jobs and help her family.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - June, 2014

loans.use: to buy detergent, bleach, bath soap, toothpaste, and toilet paper.

loans.name: Fiorella Karina

texts.es:
Fiorella es una joven emprendedora, tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera y vive en Palpa junto a su familia.
Desde hace más de 1 año se dedica a la venta de comida como pollo broaster, hamburguesas, salchipapas en las diversas fiestas que se realizan en la zona. Le va muy bien porque es una persona muy responsable, trabajadora, honesta, atenta con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece alimentos de calidad a un precio económico.
Fiorella está agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva porque con el apoyo que le han brindado ella podrá comprar mesas y sillas para dar una mejor atención a los clientes y así pueda incrementar sus ventas. De esta manera seguirá esforzándose para poco a poco mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y más adelante pueda cumplir una de sus mayores metas: "Ampliar su negocio".
texts.en:
Fiorella is a young entrepreneur, she is 20 years old, single and she lives in Palpa with her family.
